name: ICICI Amazon Pay Credit Card
annual_fee_waiver: Waived for first year; subsequently waived on spending ₹1,50,000 in a year
benefits: Welcome benefit of ₹500 Amazon Pay Gift Card on first transaction within 30 days
5% unlimited cashback on Amazon.in shopping (including Amazon Prime)
2% cashback on utilities, mobile recharges, and other bill payments
2% cashback on food delivery services like Swiggy and Zomato
Fuel surcharge waiver of 1% (up to ₹250 per statement cycle)
No-cost EMI on Amazon.in for purchases above ₹3,000
Amazon Prime membership for first year (for select customers)
Exclusive offers on Amazon Great Indian Festival and Prime Day sales

documents_required: Income proof (for salaried: latest 3 months salary slips)

fees.statement_request_fee: ₹100 per statement for statements older than 3 months

interest_rates.interest_free_period: Up to 50 days on retail purchases
interest_rates.emi_conversion_fee: Processing fee of up to 1.5% may apply

reward_limits.minimum_transaction: No minimum transaction amount for cashback
reward_limits.cashback_credit: Credited as Amazon Pay balance within 3 working days
